meanings.definition: A burst of air or wind.
meanings.sent1: The guffs of wind blew the leaves off the tree.
meanings.sent2: I felt a sudden guffs of air as I opened the window.
meanings.sent3: The guffs of wind played with my hair, making it a mess.
meanings.sent4: The guffs of air carried the kite high up into the sky.
meanings.sent5: The guffs of wind whispered secrets through the trees.

meanings.sent1: His guffs about aliens visiting Earth were amusing.
meanings.sent2: She dismissed his guffs about winning the lottery.
meanings.sent3: The guffs he spoke made everyone laugh uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: Her guffs of becoming a superhero were unrealistic.
meanings.sent5: The guffs he shared were so silly, they made no sense at all.

meanings.sent1: The guffs from the kitchen hinted at a delicious meal being cooked.
meanings.sent2: I wrinkled my nose at the unpleasant guffs coming from the garbage bin.
meanings.sent3: The guffs of perfume filled the room, making it smell lovely.
meanings.sent4: The guffs of fresh bread made my stomach growl with hunger.
meanings.sent5: The guffs of flowers in the garden were so fragrant and beautiful.
